description:
Initiative Tracker compatible with Pathfinder 2 encounter rules
Initiative tracker is an android app to track combat encounters in role playing games like Pathfinder 2.
It supports showing and editing on multiple devices at the same time.
Other devices, that are in WiFi range, are linked to each other and the initiative state is exchanged.
Technically, this works via Wifi Aware. Once new devices join and lost devices rejoin, the state is exchanged.

In addition to the Android app, it can also be opened in a browser connected to the same network.

It supports the following Pathfinder 2 encounter rules:
- Reordering when a character dies
- Delaying turns
- Ensuring player characters take their turn after non-player characters when they have the same initiative
